about_the_game:
Congratulations! You are now in possession of one (1) neurodivergent romance novel villainess!

Unfortunately, neither you nor she remember the bad romance novel you are trapped in… or which character wants her dead.

Guide your amnesiac villainess through mysteries, menacing manors, and (wo)men who may be trying to murder her.

Meet with five suspiciously gorgeous characters and pursue romance, revenge, or revolution.

Can you find clues, fight off foes, calm angry furniture, and escape from eldritch horrors while solving the mystery of this world?







Interested in joining our community of villains and villainesses? Join our mailing list to get exclusive behind-the-scenes sneak-peeks and character cards every month. Join our discord server to chat with other villainess fans and talk with the developers! Both links are on the side of our Steam page.



Save the Villainess' animated characters, backgrounds, and cutscenes allow you to step into a living painting... one where every corner, character, creature, and even cushion can lead to your death.





Guide your villainess by going on investigations, fighting battles, and making choices that lead you closer to romance, revenge or revolution. Find the information you need to solve mysteries, defeat your enemies, and make deductions that will save your villainess... or kill her.





✦ 60+ Hours of Gameplay over 4 routes

Each of the three main routes (Edmund, Izel, and Ben) offers three diverse sub-routes and mysteries, as well as 10 different good endings and 30+ bad endings. After you conquer the three major routes, there will be one final mystery to solve...

✦ User Choice

Your decisions in the story matter and determine whether you live, die, find a lover among five possible partners (including three men, one woman, and one nonbinary character), forge a life alone, or pursue secret endings. Shape your villainess’ fate, no matter how tragic or triumphant it may be!

✦ Variable Difficulty

Play in Story Mode to get in-game indicators about your likelihood of survival or play in Detective Mode to survive by your wits alone. Change mode at any time in the Settings menu.

✦ Play Your Way

Use our save/load system to save at nearly any point in the game. You can also skip and move backwards through scenes, or use the chapter system to revisit or skip any chapter you have played. You can even skip the entire common route after playing it once.



Best Laid Plans Productions, Inc. (Writing, Editing, Programming, Marketing, Game/Art/Sound/UI/UX Design), Somate Studio (Characters / CGIs / Title), Saleha Chowdhury (Backgrounds / Items / Menus / Creatures / Animals), Kmochi (CGIs / Items), Fuura_Xen (Backgrounds), Karel Kok (Backgrounds / Items), Maciej Ptasinski (Backgrounds / Items), Son Huynh (Backgrounds), Renerie (Main Promotional Materials), Studio Ghost Legs (Steam Banners & Social Media Materials), JunbugP (Butterfly Dreams Theme Song Composition & Lyrics & Mix & Master), Saki Rose (Butterfly Dreams Theme Song Vocals & Tuning), Sokei (Trailer), Yan Moe (Logo)



Additional Warnings: This game contains scenes of horror, suicidal ideation, innuendo, black comedy, bright lights, flickering lights, motion that may induce vertigo, and sudden movements. Player caution is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT, 512 MB or AMD Radeon HD 6570, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, 4 GB or AMD Radeon R9 380, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Some people have pets. You now have a romance novel villainess. Guide your neurodiverse villainess through an animated visual novel with menacing manors, mysteries, (wo)men, and murder to see if you can… Save the Villainess.
